titles.title: Expressing support for recognition of Christopher Columbus and his role in the history of the United States and recognizing the importance of students learning about Christopher Columbus and the heritage and history of the Nation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
10/8/2009--Introduced. Supports the recognition of Christopher Columbus and his role in the discovery and history of the United States.
Recognizes that it is important for young people to learn about Christopher Columbus and the discovery, heritage, and history of the nation.
Encourages all people to take advantage of educational opportunities to learn about Christopher Columbus' discovery of the Americas and U.S. history.
